Title: 25th Hour
Actors: Edward Norton, Philip Seymour Hoffman, Barry Pepper, Rosario Dawson
Plot: Cornered by the DEA, convicted New York drug dealer Montgomery Brogan reevaluates his life in the 24 remaining hours before facing a seven-year jail term.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 4 wins & 16 nominations.
Production: 40 Acres & A Mule Filmworks, Gamut Films, Industry Entertainment
